## Summary

- What changed?
- Why?

## Validation

- [ ] `npm run build`
- [ ] `npm run lint`
- [ ] `npm run format`
- [ ] `npm test`
- [ ] `npm run test:coverage`

## Risk

- [ ] Low
- [ ] Medium
- [ ] High

## Trunk-Based Checklist

- [ ] Branch name follows outcome naming (`result/*`, `hotfix/*`, `codex/*`)
- [ ] Branch is short-lived and rebased/updated from `main`
- [ ] Changes are behind feature flags if incomplete
